description: Les travaux doivent tous être exécutés conformément à la spéci (L-G2-9900/1917) formant partie de la demande de soumission. Le marché de services couvre la période du 1er juillet 2024 au 30 juin 2025
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Bid Title 
W6898-240670: Janitorial Services 2, 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick

## Brief Description
The department is seeking a janitorial services contract for the various buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick. The contract will cover the period July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025, with two optional one-year periods of renewal.

## Notice Details
* **Publication date**: 2024-03-28
* **Tender closing date**: 2024-05-10 at 14:00:00
* **Amendment date**: 2024-05-06
* **Expected contract start date**: 2024-07-01
* **Expected contract end date**: N/A
* **Solicitation number**: WS4495727071
* **Amendment number**: 6
* **Tender status**: Expired

## Technical Specifications
* **Service type**: Cleaning and Janitorial Services
* **Region of opportunity**: New Brunswick
* **Regions of delivery**: New Brunswick
* **Trade agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other Canada-specific trade agreements.

## Evaluation Criteria
The contract will be awarded based on **Lowest Price**.

## Important Details
* **Site visit**: A site visit has been scheduled for April 10, 2024. To attend, bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority by April 9, 2024 at 12:00 pm to confirm attendance.
* **Security requirements**: This document contains security requirements. Bidders are expected to comply.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC) at [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Additional Resources
The bid notice can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19245818?extsite=MTkyNDU4MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19245818?extsite=MTkyNDU4MThfQU4w
